description: The RMI segment is used to report an occurrence of an incident event pertaining or attaching to a patient encounter.

1.name: Risk Management Incident Code
1.description: A code depicting the incident that occurred during a patient’s stay. Refer to User-defined Table 0427 - Risk Management Incident Code for suggested values.

2.name: Date/Time Incident
2.description: This field contains the date and time the Risk Management Incident identified in RMI-1 - Risk Management Incident Code occurred.

3.name: Incident Type Code
3.description: A code depicting a classification of the incident type. Refer to User-defined Table 0428 - Incident Type Code for suggested values.
